channel.title: Comments on: More Relief Supplies Delivered to Biloxi/Chitimacha Communities
channel.description: Because in all fairness, there is enough...

item.title: By: greencorpsman
item.dc:creator: greencorpsman
item.description:
It was an honor for Bio Liberty http://www.bioliberty.net/ to help Plenty International deliver and distribute these supplies.
I have contacted the Mobile Broadcast News Bus. I requested that they assist in documenting the needs and provide Internet communications in the area effected. They have told me that they are working on plan to come in the next few weeks.
If you want to support this effort contact Fluxrostum at http://www.mobilebroadcastnews.com/
item.content:encoded:
